Question: Down 20–7, this person led the Vols to a 30–29 victory.
Hints: Still, trailing by 6 late in the game this person led the Colts on a 77-yard TD drive to take a 21–20 lead.
This person led his 6th game-winning drive of the season and the Colts pulled away 31–21.
It was this person's 4th game-winning drive (35th of his career) this season.
